#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    char a[11],b[11];
    scanf("%s %s",a,b);
    while(1)
    {

      if(a[0]=='0'&&a[1]=='\0'&&(b[0]=='0'&&b[1]=='\0'))
          break;
       int la=strlen(a),i,j,count=0;
       int lb=strlen(b);
       char car='0';
       for(i=la-1,j=lb-1;i>=0&&j>=0;i--,j--)
       {
           if(a[i]-'0'+b[j]-'0'+car-'0'>9){
             count++;
             car='1';
           }
           else
            car='0';
       }
       while(i>=0)
       {
           if(a[i]-'0'+car-'0'>9)
           {
               count++;
               car='1';
           }
           else
            car='0';
            i--;
       }
       while(j>=0)
       {
           if(b[j]-'0'+car-'0'>9)
           {
               count++;
               car='1';
           }
           else
            car='0';
            j--;
       }
       if(count==0)
        printf("No carry operation.\n");
       else if(count==1)
        printf("%d carry operation.\n",count);
       else
        printf("%d carry operations.\n",count);
       cin >> a >> b;
    }
    return 0;
}
